entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
